20110101023547.000|20110101023549.000|CC1|EVE IN SUBURBAN HOUSTON WHERE

20110101023559.000|20110101023600.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE DRAMA BEGAN AT 
20110101023600.000|20110101023604.000|CC1|11:00 LOCAL TIME.
